docs.snippet: With 2016 over and the NFL regular season as well, it's about time for the NBA to start showing up more often on more nights....
docs.lead_paragraph: With 2016 over and the NFL regular season as well, it's about time for the NBA to start showing up more often on more nights.

headline.main: New Year Will Bring More Games on More Nights in the NBA

docs.snippet: Hyundai Motor and affiliate Kia Motors on Monday forecast global sales to rebound in 2017 by a stronger-than-expected 5 percent, after posting their first annual sales fall in nearly two decades last year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hyundai Motor and affiliate Kia Motors on Monday forecast global sales to rebound in 2017 by a stronger-than-expected 5 percent, after posting their first annual sales fall in nearly two decades last year.

headline.main: Hyundai, Kia Target Sales Rebound After First Fall in 18 Years
headline.print_headline: Hyundai, Kia Target Sales Rebound After First Fall in 18 Years

docs.snippet: Hyundai Motor and affiliate Kia Motors on Monday said their global sales dropped 2 percent to 7.88 million vehicles in 2016 from the preceding year, falling short of their target of 8.13 million vehicles....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hyundai Motor and affiliate Kia Motors on Monday said their global sales dropped 2 percent to 7.88 million vehicles in 2016 from the preceding year, falling short of their target of 8.13 million vehicles.

headline.main: Hyundai, Kia Global Sales Fall 2 Percent; Miss Target
headline.print_headline: Hyundai, Kia Global Sales Fall 2 Percent; Miss Target

docs.snippet: Madeleine Pickens wanted the African-American chef she recruited from the country club she owns in Southern California to cook "black people food" — not "white people food" — at her rural Nevada dude ranch and wild horse sanctuary, acc...
docs.lead_paragraph: Madeleine Pickens wanted the African-American chef she recruited from the country club she owns in Southern California to cook "black people food" — not "white people food" — at her rural Nevada dude ranch and wild horse sanctuary, according to a federal lawsuit accusing her of racial discrimination.

headline.main: Lawsuit: Dude Ranch Owner Asked Chef for 'Black People Food'
headline.print_headline: Lawsuit: Dude Ranch Owner Asked Chef for 'Black People Food'

docs.snippet: South Korean prosecutors said Monday that the daughter of the confidante of impeached President Park Geun-hye has been arrested in Denmark, and that authorities were working to get her returned home in connection with a huge corruption scandal....
docs.lead_paragraph: South Korean prosecutors said Monday that the daughter of the confidante of impeached President Park Geun-hye has been arrested in Denmark, and that authorities were working to get her returned home in connection with a huge corruption scandal.

headline.main: Daughter of Woman in South Korea Scandal Arrested in Denmark
headline.print_headline: Daughter of Woman in South Korea Scandal Arrested in Denmark
